Body: Even I have seen duplicated thread as in: Cannot unlock tablet as have no internet connection?But Here's my situation:I have wifi/data turned off. I have the developer option turned on and my laptop does recognized the device with usb plugged in. (As I'm android developer)I'm using unrooted Nexus 4 .Is there any way of unlock the screen using adb way, i.e: turn on the wifi? If no luck I would probably go with hard reset.
